https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5j1MZIpcTUm2OIIsnZnBSB7Phcz.jpg Jonathan Fritz returns to his unique format and films this show live from multiple locations. This yuletide treat is a special Christmas episode which features even more tales of darkness and the macabre. Beyond the Valley of Belief Volume 2: Fritz on the Run
